purpose: Highlight the gender gap in the STEM field and its implications.
title: Data science struggles with a massive gender gap: Risk for competitiveness and quality of AI

bullets.text: Data scientists are in extremely high demand across industries, with companies striving to harness the transformative potential of AI
Diversity is a critical factor in this rapid growth
But data science still struggles with a massive diversity problem—women only make up 15% to 22% of data science professionals
Significant gap between women trained in STEM/data science and women working in data science
At risk: Slow growth, competitive disadvantage, biased AI

reasoning_strategy: Highlight disparities and potential risks associated with gender gap in STEM.
data_points: Share of women at each stage of the STEM talent funnel (in %): ~55% university graduates, ~35% STEM degrees, ~25% STEM workforce, ~15-22% data science professionals

content_zones.right: Bullet points highlighting issues and implications
